titles.title: A resolution designating the week of November 15 through 19, 2010, as "Global Entrepreneurship Week/USA".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 11/17/2010--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates November 15 through 19, 2010, as Global Entrepreneurship Week/USA. Supports the goals of such Week, including: (1) inspiring young people everywhere to embrace innovation, imagination, and creativity; and (2) training the next generation of entrepreneurial leaders.
